{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wireless miniPCIe adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Compex_WLE900V5-23 |wikipedia = |brand = Compex |model = WLE900V5 |submodelappend = |submodel = -23 |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = (CUS223) |page_start_date = 11/04/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Compex_WLE900V5-23 |sernum = |wlclass = AC1300 |series = WLE900 |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = 1.1 |ifconnector = Mini PCIe |formfactor = |vendor_id = |device_id = |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880 v2; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MMCX |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = an+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = Replaced |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''This Product is no longer available, it has been replaced by [[Compex WLE900V5-27]]''' {{CompexMailKimp}} 802.11ac 5GHz 3T3R 1.3Gbps * [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (V2), CUS223 Reference Design * Maximum 23dBm output power (per chain), 28dBm (aggregate) * 802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11a/n * 3X3 MIMO Technology & up to 1.3Gbps * MiniPCI Express 1.1 interface === Features === *This Compex 802.11ac 5Ghz Wireless Module has a maximum output power :of 23dBm per chain, part of Compex acWave series of 11ac Products, :featuring QCA9880 V2 Chipset with overall throughput up to 1300Mbps :with 3x3 supporting MIMO. Sporting 3x MMCX Antenna Connectors with :built in ESD Protection with ESD/EMP Immunity Threshold of 15KeV. [http://www.compex.com.sg:809/Datasheets/WLE900V5-27_Dsv1.0.4-141010-I.pdf] *Supports Spatial Multiplexing, Maximal Ratio Combining (MRC), :low-density parity check (LDPC), Cyclic-Delay Diversity (CDD), :Space Time Block Code (STBC) *Supported by either CompexWRT with QCA Atheros Reference Wireless :Driver or OpenWRT with ath10k Wireless Driver on WPJ344 === Ordering Configuration === 
Item Code 	 	Chipset    Card Information
WLE900V5-23 8AA000 	QCA9880    3x3 11ac 5GHz High Power miniPCIe
WLE900V5-23 8AB000 	QCA9880    3x3 11ac 5GHz High Power miniPCIe
WLE900V5-23 8BB000 	QCA9890    3x3 11ac 5GHz High Power miniPCIe
